snippet: Rap Genius has found roadblocks on the way to the definitive lyric resource.
abstract: Rap Genius, popular Web site that seeks to decipher every lyric in hip-hop by allowing anyone to annotate lyrics with words, photos and videos, has hit some roadblocks in path to success; project has been dogged by awkward questions about race and authenticity and by sometimes outlandish behavior of its founders Tom Lehman, Mahbod Moghadam and Ilan Zechory, three Yale graduates.
lead_paragraph: Rap Genius has found roadblocks on the way to the definitive lyric resource.

headline.seo: Yale Graduates Seek a Degree in Hip-Hop
headline.main: Yale Graduates Seek a Hip-Hop Degree
headline.print_headline: Yale Graduates Seek A Hip-Hop Degree
